faq.question: What is CleanNFT?
faq.answer: CleanNFT is a blockchain-powered recycling rewards platform that turns waste into digital value. Every recycling action creates a verifiable NFT on the blockchain.

faq.question: How do I get started?
faq.answer: Simply start recycling at any participating recycling station. Scan the QR code, and your NFT will be minted automatically. Claim it through the PWA or mobile app.

faq.question: Which blockchain does CleanNFT use?
faq.answer: CleanNFT runs on the Polygon network, providing fast transactions and low gas fees. NFTs are ERC-721 standard compliant.

faq.question: Are my NFTs secure?
faq.answer: Yes. All smart contracts are audited by OpenZeppelin, and 100% of user funds are stored in cold storage. Your NFTs are yours forever.

faq.question: Can I trade my NFTs?
faq.answer: Yes! NFTs minted through CleanNFT are ERC-721 standard tokens and can be traded on any compatible marketplace like OpenSea.

faq.question: What happens to my recycling data?
faq.answer: Your recycling data is encrypted and stored securely. Only anonymized, aggregated data is used for analytics and reporting purposes.

faq.question: How do I claim my NFT?
faq.answer: After recycling at a participating station, you'll receive a notification. Simply open the CleanNFT app, connect your wallet, and claim your NFT.

faq.question: What if I lose access to my wallet?
faq.answer: Please store your wallet seed phrase securely. CleanNFT cannot recover lost wallets or access your private keys. Your wallet is your responsibility.
